feed.title: Sault Ste. Marie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:25 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 3:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 61 %
Dewpoint: -5.4°C
Wind: NW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow at times heavy beginning near noon. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
